mapper.insert: insert into hotplace (user_id, title, content, address, save_folder, original_file, save_file) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{address}, #{saveFolder}, #{originalFile}, #{saveFile})
mapper.select: select hotplace_no, user_id, title, content, address, recommendation, save_folder, original_file, save_file, date from hotplace order by recommendation desc limit 3
mapper.delete: delete from recommendation_hotplace where hotplace_no = #{hotplaceNo} and
mapper.select: select count(hotplace_no) from hotplace h, user u where h.user_id =u.id
